name: Media Finder
author: Vladimir Kadalashvili

sections.description: Media Finder helps you find images and video on Flickr and YouTube quickly and easily and insert them to your post with one click. A lot fo readers find posts with illustrations more interesting in comparison to the text-only posts. But we often don’t have necessary illustrations which fit the subject of our posts. Here Media Finder can help you. It lest you find mediafiles on the largest storages of video and images on the internet, and illustrate your posts with them.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload media_finder.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Why FAQ is required here?

I don’t know, but this should be definitely optional.
sections.changelog:
0.0.1

  • An initial version

0.0.2

  • Options for images search were added

1.0.0

  • New options for images and video search, code refactoring, minor bug fixes
